review: Maximize Prime Membership......so many times I channel surf do not find anything worth watching on TV.  Happily, I have the fire stik as an alternative.
author: Barb "loves Panera"

review: The fire stick is a great device for streaming Netflix and other media devices I'm very impressed by the fire stick and I'm looking to get the fire t.v
author: jigga3900

review: Great way to catch up on all your favorites on Netflix and Prime TV like The New Orange is Black , Hpuse of Cards ect.. N very easy to install plug into your USB on your TV and as long as you have internet your all set.
author: Elizabeth Hardy "Elizabeth Hardy"

review: I'm working abroad for the military. When I ordered the Amazon Fire TV Stick I didn't expect that every channel/application is Geographic Content Restricted. Except Netflix that's working fine.If somebody has any suggestions, please let me know.
author: Jansen

review: Constantly drops WiFi signal mean while  every other device is still working. I own a fire tv that I moved to the room where the fire stick was and I have had no issues. I hate this thing, I should have bought another fire tv!
author: Richard M. Perryii "Crazy2sigmapi99"

review: Compared to purple product - I found the controller to be less sturdy and seemingly "cheaper".  I was disappointed in that I could not find some of the apps to which I had become accustomed on the purple competitor.  Font size in menus was difficult to read from a distance at which most large screen TVs are viewed. Basically, I found nothing advantageous to this stick versus the purple competitor.
author: steven c. martz
